Sass Break

What's Sass break?

Sass break is a humble new blog for the Sass community. It’s currently maintained and curated by David Conner and Guil Hernandez. If you’d like to contribute an article to Sass break, let us know.

Sass break was built with Jekyll, Sass (of course), and hosted with GitHub Pages. Follow @sassbreak on Twitter for more updates.

Sass Break

A simple blog about Sass. @sassbreak
